show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Survival Medicine Handbook
content:
Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, www.drznaturally.com, interviews Dr. Bones, and Nurse Amy. Joe Alton, MD,  also known as “Dr. <!--more--> Bones the Disaster Doctor”, is a medical doctor and Amy Alton, ARNP,  also known as “Nurse Amy”, is an advanced registered nurse practitioner and a certified nurse midwife.  They are medical preparedness experts and the authors of the “The Survival Medicine Handbook”, a guide for when medical help is not on the way.
  In addition to their medical credentials, the Altons are associated with the Master Gardener program in Florida, with an emphasis on growing food and medicinal herbs.
They have Ham Radio licenses, and raise tilapia as a food fish.
Their mission: To place a medically self-reliant caregiver in every family or mutual assistance group before a disaster occurs.
 Contact:  www.doomandbloom.
net.
